speaker: NARRATOR
text: Counselors and other school personnel often have the opportunity to discuss risk behaviors  with students, like drinking alcohol.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: They have a unique role as both representatives of the school and professionals whose job  it is to advocate for the students.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: The counselor's approach and tone throughout such conversations are likely to influence  the degree with which students trust them.

speaker: NARRATOR
text: Watch what happens when this counselor uses a judgmental stance and lectures the student  about school policies and the dangers of drinking.
